name: Cascade Spearfishing
description:
A spearfishing game with a twist! 

A mini-game where you must catch as many fishes as you can while they fall down a cascading stream of water, but you can only catch as long as you don't run out of time for your dinner!

This game was made for Mini Game Jam 104: Cascade (Although submitted super late)

Controls

Hold the 'Left Mouse button' and drag(up and down ) to aim the spear.

Release Left Mouse button to shoot the spear to the aim.

(Controls are not well optimized and rushed for the game jam, sorry)
